name: @local/oneclick-admin
description: Automatically enables one-click admin for new Local sites

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run compile && npm run create-entry-points
scripts.create-entry-points: echo "module.exports = require('./main/index').default || require('./main/index');" > lib/main.js && echo "module.exports = require('./renderer/index').default || require('./renderer/index');" > lib/renderer.js
